analyzed: namaḥ ārya avalokiteśvarāya bodhisattvāya mahāsattvāya mahā kāruṇikāya
namaḥ sarva vidyā rāja vaśa prāptaye mahā yoga yogi īśvarāya
tasmai namaskṛtvā idam ārya avalokiteśvara mukha udgīrṇam
deva nāga yakṣa rākṣasa śakra brahma lokapāla viṣṇu maheśvara nārāyaṇa skanda kubera asura indra mātṛ gaṇa namaskṛtam vajrakṣura mahīyam
aprameya artha sādhakam asahyam sarva bhūtānām sarva vighna vināśakam

original: amoghaṃ sarvakarmaṇāṃ viṣāṇāñca vināyanam | tad yathā
analyzed: amogham sarva karmaṇām viṣāṇām ca vināyanam tat yathā

original: om tarula tarula vitarula vitarula sarvaviṣaghātaka sarvabhūtavidrāvaka jvalitānalavisphuliṅgāṭṭahāsa kesarātopāpravitakāya vajrakṣuranirgatita  #
analyzed: om tarula tarula vitarula vitarula sarva viṣa ghātaka sarva bhūta vidrāvaka jvalita anala visphuliṅga aṭṭahāsa vajra kṣura nirgatita

original: calitavasudhātala bajrodaśvasata hāsita-marutakṣatipraśamanakara paraduṣṭavighnān saṃbhakṣaṇakara svavidyopadeśakara paramaśāntikara buddha  #
analyzed: calita vasudhā tala hāsita maruta kṣati praśamana kara para duṣṭa vighnān saṃbhakṣaṇa kara sva vidyā upadeśa kara parama śānti kara buddha
rakṣa rakṣaḥ ātma sva hitān mantreṇa

original: sidhya sidhya sarvakarmasu me siddhe dehi dehi |
analyzed: sidhya sidhya sarva karmasu me siddhe dehi dehi

original: āveśa āveśa praveśa praveśa sarvagraheṣu apratihata |
analyzed: āveśa āveśa praveśa praveśa sarva graheṣu apratihata

original: dhuna dhuna vidhuna vidhuna matha matha pramatha pramatha sarvavaropagrama |
analyzed: dhuna dhuna vidhuna vidhuna matha matha pramatha pramatha sarva vara upagrama
viṣa kara viṣa draṃṣṭra viṣa cūrṇayoḥ abhicāra viṣa karaṇa

original: nityāparaprekṣaṇa trāsaya trāsaya mahābodhisattva ṛddhadaṃṣṭraṇena sarvabhayebhyaḥ sattvānāṃ rakṣa rakṣa |
analyzed: nitya apara prekṣaṇa trāsaya trāsaya mahā bodhisattva ṛddha daṃṣṭraṇena sarva bhayebhyaḥ sattvānām rakṣa rakṣa

original: mama buddhadharmasaṃghānujñātaṃ me karma śīghraṃ kuru kuru phaṭ |
analyzed: mama buddha dharma saṃgha anujñātam me karma śīghram kuru kuru phaṭ
para duṣṭa vighnān saṃbhakṣaṇa karāya phaṭ

original: ye kecit mama ahiteṣiṇaḥ kāye kramanti mantrayaṇa yamanti juhvānati kākhordaṃ kurvanti |
analyzed: ye kecid mama ahita iṣiṇaḥ kāye kramanti kākhordam kurvanti

original: namaḥ sarvaduṣṭagrahotsādanāya hayagrīvāya sidhyantu mantrapadaiḥ svāhā |
analyzed: namaḥ sarva duṣṭa graha utsādanāya hayagrīvāya sidhyantu mantra padaiḥ svāhā

original: om amitodbhavāya huṃ phaṭ phaṭ svāhā |
analyzed: om amitodbhavāya hum phaṭ phaṭ svāhā
namaḥ sarva sattvānām sidhyantu mantra padāya svāhā
